comment._content: Is it from this battle? From Wikipedia - en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Battle_of_Spotsylvania_Court_House

comment.realname: lifeasdaddy ...a guy, his wife, and their son...
comment.author: 13267298@N00
comment._content: During the reunion, there was a reenactment of Pickett's Charge. This photograph was taken either just before or just after the reenactment at Bloody Angle on July 3, 1913. See a photograph of the same location taken from a slightly different view, with the bearded Confederate veteran standing beside the Stars and Bars. See here: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3641565376/

comment.author: 21734563@N04
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Veterans of the American Civil War, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment._content: Thanks for the additional information here. We'll correct the title, and include the date and event next time we update.
